original_title: Fire breaks out in a building in Jaffna
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A fire broke out in a building in Jaffna during the early hours of Thursday (28) morning.
Sri Lanka Police said the fire broke out in three shops located in the building.
The Fire Brigade of the Jaffna Municipal Council has doused the fire.
No one was injured in the fire, and several adjacent shops were reportedly damaged.
